channel.title: Wasting Time Podcast
channel.description:
Sit back, relax and waste some time with us. Great music mixed in with interesting ramblings and rants on a little bit of everything.
Richard Jeffries
channel.itunes:author: Richard Jeffries
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sit back, relax and waste some time with us. Great music mixed in with interesting ramblings and rants on a little bit of everything. Richard Jeffries

item.title: WTPCsh92
item.description:
Wasting time podcast show 92 Richard Jeffries

I talk about a bunch of stuff like, school, unemployment, Harley, science, and much much more.

Music in todays edisode is courtesty of Ariel Publicity and the artists.

Surrender - Jennings http://cyberpr.biz/clients/2934
http://www.jennings-music.com/

The Proximity of Death - Jordan Reyne
http://cyberpr.biz/clients/2840
http://www.jordanreyne.com/

Thanks to: Music.podshow.com , Ariel Publicity, Apple, Podlounge, Blubrry, Podshow, www.erkpod.com , And you the great Listeners!!!!

www.wastingtimepodcast.com wastingtimepodcast@me.com

Check me out on Twitter - rgspro
Podshow - rgspro.podshow.com
Myspace - www.myspace.com/wastingtimepodcast
Facebook - Richard Jeffries. Group at
http://groups.to/thewastingtimepodcast

The Wasting time podcast uses: Mac, Linux, Peavey, Behringer, Presonus, Oktava, MXL, Shure, and Sony to record, produce, and host the show.

item.title: wtpcsh91
item.description:
WTPCshow91 Richard Jeffries I'm back! Live mistakes and all! STILL
Today's show: Topics include but not limited to: New Years eve crap, New Apple Products, Obama takes another vacation, Jessy James and Kat Von D, U.S. turning into V for Vendetta and Dark Ages, Mel Gibson returning to Australia, And mouch much more!

Music in this episode from Ariel Publicity:

Mark Radcliffe - Blow it all away http://markradcliffe.net

Michael Behm - Where I belong www.myspace.com/michaelbehmmusic


Thanks to: Music.podshow.com , Ariel Publicity, Apple, Podlounge, Blubrry, Podshow, www.erkpod.com , And you the great Listeners!!!!

www.wastingtimepodcast.com wastingtimepodcast@me.com

Check me out on Twitter - rgspro
Podshow - rgspro.podshow.com
Myspace - www.myspace.com/wastingtimepodcast
Facebook - Richard Jeffries. Group at
http://groups.to/thewastingtimepodcast
Bebo - richardj286.bebo.com

The Wasting time podcast uses: Mac, Linux, Peavey, Behringer, Presonus, Oktava, MXL, Shure, and Sony to record, produce, and host the show.

item.title: WTPCsh90
item.description:
wtpcsh90 Richard Jeffries Live mistakes and all!
Today's show: Stories on Nickleback, Boeing, Japanese web page naughty girl clock, Computer Geeks, Texting, Australia Internet Filter, McDonalds free Wifi, My Google experiment, Faceboob crap, Government crap, Climate Gate crap, ErkpodFM 50th episode shout out.

Music in this episode from Ariel Publicity or Podsafe Music Network:

The Blue Seeds - That Night in Amsterdam http://www.theblueseeds.com
Check The Blue Seeds out on iTunes

Check out these great websites and pod-casts:

Despatches From Agent Orange http://agentorangepodcast.mevio.com
Erkpod http://channelerk.com
Being healthy for busy people, www.beinghealthy.tv
Some guys in a car - www.someguysinacar.tv
Hyper Nonsense - http://hypernonsense.com
Inside my head - http://jen.phantompower.org
Tee Morris www.teemorris.com
Philippa Ballantine Whispers at the edge - http://whispersattheedge.com

www.wastingtimepodcast.com wastingtimepodcast@mac.com
Thanks to: Music.podshow.com , Ariel Publicity, Apple, Podlounge, Blubrry, Podshow, www.erkpod.com , And you the great Listeners!!!!

www.wastingtimepodcast.com wastingtimepodcast@mac.com
Google voice line 1-630-426-9872 (WTPC)
Check me out on Twitter - rgspro
Podshow - rgspro.podshow.com
Myspace - www.myspace.com/wastingtimepodcast
Facebook - Richard Jeffries. Group at
http://groups.to/thewastingtimepodcast
Bebo - richardj286.bebo.com

The Wasting time podcast uses: Mac, Logic Studio, Linux, Peavey, Behringer, Presonus, Oktava, MXL, Shure, and Sony to record, produce, and host the show.
